timeline.message:
workspace: Use memoizing suppliers for some replaceable data

This update also includes changes Peter made around closing the
remote server when investigating launchpad testing issues.

Signed-off-by: BJ Hargrave <bj@bjhargrave.com>

workspaceindex: Try hard to use a File object for JarIndex

This is more efficient since we use ZipFile instead of ZipInputStream.

Signed-off-by: BJ Hargrave <bj@bjhargrave.com>

timeline.bodyText: I am not happy with the replacement of Lazy with Memoize. It has no close support nor introspective facilities. Can  you explain why you made this change?
timeline.author: pkriens

replies.bodyText: I would like to revert until there is a compelling reason to make it less functional and more complex?
replies.author: pkriens

replies.bodyText: Lazy has some serious issues. I am happy to discuss when you are available.
replies.author: bjhargrave
